scripts.db:reset: npx sequelize-cli db:drop && npx sequelize-cli db:create && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
scripts.db:test:reset: NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize-cli db:drop && NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize-cli db:create && NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && NODE_ENV=test npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
